title: Dramatic change in the properties of magnetite-modified MOF particles depending on the synthesis approach
content:
Publication date: 30 March 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 6

Author(s): Lyubov Bondarenko, Rose Baimuratova, Marco Reindl, Verena Zach, Artur Dzeranov, Denis Pankratov, Kamila Kydralieva, Gulzhian Dzhardimalieva, Dagmar Kolb, Friedrich E. Wagner, Sebastian P. Schwaminger
